snippet: The young Holocaust diarist Anne Frank most likely died a month earlier than previously believed, research by the Frank museum in Amsterdam has concluded.
abstract: Anne Frank Museum in Amsterdam concludes, based on witness testimony and documentation, that Anne Frank likely died month earlier than originally thought; revised estimate shows that Frank died in February 1945.
lead_paragraph: The young Holocaust diarist Anne Frank most likely died a month earlier than previously believed, research by the Frank museum in Amsterdam has concluded.

headline.main: The Netherlands: New Details on Date of Anne Frank’s Death
headline.print_headline: Europe; The Netherlands: New Details on Date of Anne Frank’s Death
